pass-along.translation[0].definitions[0]: the act of increasing prices because costs have increased
pass-along.translation[1].definitions[0]: relating to people who read someone else’s newspaper or magazine, but do not buy their own copy
‘Animation Magazine’ has one of the highest pass-along rates of any entertainment magazine.
pass-along.translation[1].definitions[1]: relating to people who pass an email message or computer file on to other people
The pass-along rate for an e-zine is much greater than for a Web page. It is easier to forward an e-mail document than a Web page.
